title: Trump Rhetoric vs . Harris Policies | The Jewish Press - JewishPress . com | Caroline B . Glick | 8 Av 5784 – Sunday , August 11 , 2024
message:
American Jewish concerns and convictionsAccording to a Pew survey of American Jews from March, 89% of American Jews are supportive of Israel.
A June 2024 survey of American Jews conducted by the American Jewish Committee showed that their commitment has only grown since Oct. 7.
Seven percent of American Jews reported considering moving to another country as a result.
Tlaib and Bush, of course are outspoken in their hatred for Israel and for American Jews who support Israel.
This week pollster Richard Baris released a survey that found Harris’s support among Jews stands at a mere 52.7%, with 45.9% favoring Trump.

title: Latest Articles
message:
The ‘Eagleton Affair’ may not come immediately to mind, except to those who either were old enough to vote in 1972 or are true students of history and politics.
Thomas Eagleton was then a 42-year-old senator from Missouri who became George McGovern’s fifth or sixth choice for the VP slot after McGovern had secured the nomination.
The more preferred choices had already said no to McGovern, probably the furthest Left candidate ever to run for the Presidency at that time.
When so many say no, there is usually a good reason for doing so.
McGovern was that reason.
